p: According to our sugarcane expansion scenario, this crop cover will increase to ~30% on average in the state of SÃ£o Paulo by 2050. Sugarcane area will increase from 26% to 34% in the Cerrado region (11,200 to 14,500 ha) and from 23% to 31% in the Atlantic Forest region (8,200 to 11,100 ha) ( S6 Fig).
